About Me

I am a learning developer who is passionate about technology and wish to work with a great team in a great environment. I am a at JIIT Noida who likes to tackle challenging problems. I am an open source enthusiast who has explored and experimented experimented in many different fields of Computer Science. I love building things.

  • Playing Badminton
